snippet.title: Top 10 NEW & Upcoming Games To Play In October 2025
snippet.description:
October is stacked with new games! From Ghost of Yotei to Battlefield 6, Pokémon Legends Z-A, and more—here’s every big release you need to know about this month on PC, Xbox, PS5, and Nintendo Switch 2

0:00 Intro
0:39 Ghost of Yotei
1:55 2KXO
3:16 Kingmakers
4:28 Absolum
5:38 Little Nightmares III
6:41 Battlefield 6
8:18 Pokemon Legends Z-A
9:35 Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines 2
10:54 The Outer Worlds 2
11:57 ARC Raiders
12:54 Subscribe For More Monthly Games
